reviews.review: Best Shooter game of all time
this is the best game and if you dont think so you are wrong

Good game, had many fun killing everyone with gravity gun and smg. Also, It was funny to hear some russian guys saying "privet" but if we speak about the gameplay itself, it could have been much better. If you'll ask me, should i buy this? The answer is: Yes, but only if in half-life complete pack or in other valve's packs.
Throw toilets at people, have awesome battles and most important of all try to find a server. That's Half-Life 2 Deathmatch for you.
HI DPOERT ME YUI RP ROBLOX APERTRE

When playing with friends,really nice game. Feels like I'm playing against bots in servers though,with all the inhumane movements,but I like when other people join our servers too,because unlike the sweaty tryhards in CS:GTFO,you actually have a chance so it's fun. For the price,and still,although it is kinda dead this used to be pretty big and it's really fun,so start reviving this holy game!

Best half life game next to blue shift, original and well balanced take on the series with ample opportunity to have countless hours of fun. It's worth purchasing at full price especially if you're considering alyx over this. This is better AND has vr support.
